Package squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx

Interface IPanelBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
IPanelBuilder.Skeleton, SquidPanelBuilder
public interface IPanelBuilder
Interface to build instances of SquidPanel by taking care of adjusting the panel to the screen size and the available fonts.
Author:
smelC

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  IPanelBuilder.Skeleton
    A partial implementation of IPanelBuilder.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int adjustCellSize​(int sz)  
    SquidPanel buildByCells​(int hCells, int vCells, int cellWidth, int cellHeight, TextCellFactory tcf_)
    Builds a panel by the number of requested cells.
    SquidPanel buildScreenWide​(int screenWidth, int screenHeight, int desiredCellSize, TextCellFactory tcf)
    This method builds a panel whose number of cells is such that the cell size is close to desiredCellSize.
    boolean cellSizeTooBig​(int cellSize)
    Method to check whether increasing the cell size is possible.
    boolean cellSizeTooSmall​(int cellSize)

    int fontSizeForCellSize​(int cellSize)

  • Method Details

    • buildScreenWide

      SquidPanel buildScreenWide​(int screenWidth, int screenHeight, int desiredCellSize, TextCellFactory tcf)
      This method builds a panel whose number of cells is such that the cell size is close to desiredCellSize. This method only supports square cells.
      Parameters:
      screenWidth - The screen's width, in number of pixels, as given by libgdx.
      screenHeight - The screen's height, in number of pixels, as given by libgdx.
      desiredCellSize - The cell size that you would like the panel to have. Width and height cannot be different, because this method supports only square cells.
      tcf - The TextCellFactory to use. Can be null to create the panel.
      Returns:
      A screen wide squid panel, margins-aware, and with its position set.

    • buildByCells

      SquidPanel buildByCells​(int hCells, int vCells, int cellWidth, int cellHeight, TextCellFactory tcf_)
      Builds a panel by the number of requested cells.
      Parameters:
      hCells - The number of horizontal cells of the panel to build.
      vCells - The number of vertical cells of the panel to build.
      cellWidth - The width of a cell (in pixels).
      cellHeight - The height of a cell (in pixels).
      tcf_ - The text cell factory to use, if any.
      Returns:
      A freshly built panel.

    • adjustCellSize

      int adjustCellSize​(int sz)
      Parameters:
      sz -
      Returns:
      A cell size close to sz that can be displayed (i.e. for which there's a font, according to fontSizeForCellSize(int) and hasFontOfSize(int) ).

    • cellSizeTooBig

      boolean cellSizeTooBig​(int cellSize)
      Method to check whether increasing the cell size is possible.
      Parameters:
      cellSize -
      Returns:
      true if cellSize is too big.

    • cellSizeTooSmall

      boolean cellSizeTooSmall​(int cellSize)
      Method to check whether decreasing the cell size is possible.
      Parameters:
      cellSize -
      Returns:
      true if cellSize is too small.

    • hasFontForCellOfSize

      boolean hasFontForCellOfSize​(int cellSize)
      Parameters:
      cellSize -
      Returns:
      Whether there's a font available for a cell of size cellSize.

    • fontSizeForCellSize

      int fontSizeForCellSize​(int cellSize)
      Parameters:
      cellSize -
      Returns:
      The font size to use for a square cell size of cellSize. Generally, it is cellSize; but it can be less in case glyphs are too large.

    • hasFontOfSize

      boolean hasFontOfSize​(int sz)
      Parameters:
      sz -
      Returns:
      Whether a square font of size sz is available.
